thread.title: Chelsea news: Arturo Vidal has 'no reason' to leave Bayern | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Chelsea news: Arturo Vidal has 'no reason' to leave Bayern | Daily Mail Online

author: Alex Martin For Mailonline
title: Chelsea news: Arturo Vidal has 'no reason' to leave Bayern | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share 'But there is no reason for me to leave Bayern. I wear this jersey with pride. I feel happy, my wife feels happy, and the children are happy. And I still have big goals in Munich.' Having put those transfer rumours to bed, Vidal was then asked about Wednesday's hotly anticipated Champions League round of 16 first leg clash against Arsenal. Vidal won three of his four Serie A titles under the management of Antonio Conte at Juventus Bayern Munich faced the Gunners in the group stages last season and hammered them 5-1 at the Allianz Arena. However, with his international team-mate Alexis Sanchez in red-hot form, Arsene Wenger's men are likely to be a much tougher opponent this time around. Vidal, who is yet to win the Champions League, has called on his team-mates to be 'warriors' on the pitch. He continued: 'We do not need a warrior against Arsenal â€“ we need 11 warriors. We want to show that we are one of the best teams in the world and we want to win this Champions League. I want to keep this cup in my hands.' Antonio Conte is reportedly eyeing up a summer move for the Chile international midfielder Vidal is looking to win the first Champions League of his career but must first beat Arsenal RELATED ARTICLES
